title: Add Viper Elite to gaming mice catalog

requirements.text: Add a new Viper Elite gaming mouse product to the mice array in frontend/src/data/products.ts with name, description, price, and specifications following the existing product data structure

quotes: add to gaming mice viper elite

acceptanceCriteria: Viper Elite appears in the gaming mice product grid on the homepage
Product card displays with consistent styling matching other mice products
Product includes specifications array with relevant gaming mouse specs

constraints: Follow the existing Product interface structure from frontend/src/data/products.ts
Maintain consistency with existing gaming mice product specifications and pricing patterns
Use the green neon accent color (--neon-green) consistent with the mice category
nonGoals: Adding new product categories beyond gaming mice
Modifying the backend or data persistence layer
Changing the existing product card design or layout
